subsections.title: Design and Durability
subsections.content: The iPhone 16 Pro boasts a Grade 5 titanium design with a microblasted texture, ensuring strength and lightness. Available in four stunning finishes, including the new Desert Titanium. It is splash, water, and dust resistant, featuring the latest-generation Ceramic Shield for enhanced durability.

subsections.title: Display and Camera
subsections.content: New display technology offers thinner borders and larger 6.3-inch and 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR displays. The 48MP Ultra Wide camera captures high-resolution photos and videos with advanced features like autofocus and ProRAW support. The 5x Telephoto camera provides sharper close-ups from a distance.

subsections.title: Personal and Private
subsections.content: Apple Intelligence is a personal intelligence system that assists in writing, self-expression, and task completion with privacy protections. It is designed to safeguard your privacy at every step, utilizing on-device processing and Private Cloud Compute.

subsections.title: Productivity Tools
subsections.content: Discover tools that aid in writing, focusing, and communicating. Create Genmoji in the keyboard, use Siri for step-by-step instructions, and receive priority messages in Mail. Writing Tools can proofread, rewrite, and summarize text. The Image Playground app allows for the creation of unique images based on descriptions or concepts.

subsections.title: Advanced Features
subsections.content: Camera Control provides easy access to camera tools, enabling adjustments to exposure or depth of field. The A18 Pro chip enhances video and photo features, delivering top graphics performance for AAA gaming and 4K 120 fps Dolby Vision video recording.

subsections.title: A18 Pro Chip
subsections.content: The A18 Pro chip features a faster Neural Engine, improved CPU and GPU, and increased memory bandwidth. It offers advanced video and photo capabilities and the best graphics performance for gaming, with hardware-accelerated ray tracing and Game Mode in iOS 18.

subsections.title: Battery Life
subsections.content: The iPhone 16 Pro provides extended battery life, with the Pro Max model offering up to 33 hours of video playback. Fast wireless charging is supported with up to 25W using a 30W power adapter, allowing up to 50% charge in approximately 30 minutes.

subsections.title: Satellite Connectivity
subsections.content: The iPhone 16 Pro can connect to a satellite when cell service or Wi-Fi is unavailable, enabling message sending and receiving and roadside assistance. Emergency SOS via satellite allows texting emergency services when necessary.

subsections.title: Privacy and Security
subsections.content: Apple Intelligence and the new Passwords app secure your data and accounts with end-to-end encryption. You can manage which contacts to share with apps and the extent of information shared over time.

subsections.title: Accessibility
subsections.content: Features like Eye Tracking, Music Haptics, and Vocal Shortcuts assist users with disabilities in navigating and using their devices more effectively. Eye Tracking allows control of the iPhone with eye movements, and Music Haptics synchronizes the Taptic Engine with song rhythms.

subsections.title: Sustainability
subsections.content: All Apple data centers operate on 100% renewable electricity. The iPhone 16 Pro incorporates more recycled metals, including over 95% recycled lithium in the battery, 100% recycled gold in the USB-C connector, and 100% recycled copper in the MagSafe charger. The packaging is 100% fiber-based and thinner, reducing carbon impact for shipping.

subsections.title: Ethical Practices
subsections.content: Apple is dedicated to ethical practices, including the use of recycled materials and sustainable packaging. The company also prioritizes privacy and security, ensuring user data is protected and inaccessible to anyone, including Apple.
